channel.title: [Solved] Whonix14/Qubes3.2 latest upgrades block apt networking
channel.description:
+ Qubes R3.2 + Whonix 14
After the recent upgrades I can no longer get networking for apt in my templates. I was using rustybird's update cache for around a year now, but the problem persists even if I switch to a Whonix gateway. I've attempted to look into the new files in `/etc/uwt.d/` that the upgrade pulled in, but I'm not finding the problem.
Here is the upgrade log that broke things: https://paste.debian.net/plainh/b5ab1658.
Here is what happens when I try to upgrade now: https://paste.debian.net/plainh/2864806c.
Thanks in advance for reading. I can provide any other information needed.

item.title: [Solved] Whonix14/Qubes3.2 latest upgrades block apt networking
item.dc:creator: qubenix
item.description:
Thank you @Patrick, this is now solved for me.

Read full topic

item.title: [Solved] Whonix14/Qubes3.2 latest upgrades block apt networking
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Fix:

github.com/Whonix/qubes-whonix

fix, blocked upgrade issue 

https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix14-qubes3-2-latest-upgrades-block-apt-networking
Thanks to @qubenix for the bug report!
by adrelanos on 07:17AM - 19 Jun 18 UTC
changed 1 files with 3 additions and 1 deletions.

Workaround until fixed package got uploaded:

sudo apt-get.anondist-orig update

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved] Whonix14/Qubes3.2 latest upgrades block apt networking

item.title: [Solved] Whonix14/Qubes3.2 latest upgrades block apt networking
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
FYI only:

  • https://github.com/Whonix/uwt
  • https://github.com/Whonix/qubes-whonix

Possibly any of these changes to the following files could be the cause. These changes can be tracked here:

  • https://github.com/Whonix/qubes-whonix/commits/master/etc/uwt.d/40_qubes.conf
  • https://github.com/Whonix/uwt/blob/master/etc/uwt.d/30_uwt_default.conf

Read full topic
item.source: [Solved] Whonix14/Qubes3.2 latest upgrades block apt networking

After the recent upgrades I can no longer get networking for apt in my templates.
